feed.title: Google Cloud: Contact Center AI Insights
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Contact Center AI Insights

entry.content: This product has a new name. The same product with the same features is now called Customer Experience Insights, or CX Insights for short.
entry.summary: We are excited to announce the launch of Customer Experience Insights, now known as CX Insights. This new name reflects the same great product and features you already know, focusing on delivering valuable customer insights.
entry.title: Announcement: Customer Experience Insights (CX Insights) is here

entry.content:
Conversational Insights offers the following subscriptions:

  • Standard edition provides a suite of tools to analyze customer service conversations.
  • Enterprise edition includes the standard edition tools and Quality AI.
  • Standalone Quality AI provides only automated evaluation tools.

Pricing is based on how you interact with your customers:

  • Chat conversations are billed per message.
  • Voice conversations are billed per minute.
entry.summary: Conversational Insights now offers Standard and Enterprise editions, alongside the Standalone Quality AI option. Pricing varies based on chat messages or voice minutes.
entry.title: Changed: Conversational Insights: New Edition Options

entry.content:
Quality AI offers the virtual agent platformÂ to help with quality management for virtual agents. The virtual agent platform presents data for the following metrics, aggregated across all an agent's conversations:

  • Rate of escalation to a human agent
  • Latencies with respect to operations that an agent performs
  • Customer sentiments
entry.summary: Quality AI's virtual agent platform helps with quality management for virtual agents.
entry.title: Feature: Quality AI Virtual Agent Platform

entry.content: Conversational Insights offers conversation datasets in preview. Choose from your existing history or upload new conversations to curate customized datasets to test and evaluate the results of Agent Assist summarization.
entry.summary: Conversational Insights now offers conversation datasets in preview. You can use your existing history or upload new conversations to create customized datasets for testing and evaluating Agent Assist summarization.
entry.title: Feature: New Dataset Feature

entry.content: Quality AI offers multiple scorecards in preview. With multiple scorecards, Quality AI can evaluate a single conversation against different criteria and provide multiple conversation scores. You can also choose which scorecard data to view on each page of the console.
entry.summary: Quality AI now supports multiple scorecards, allowing you to evaluate conversations against different criteria and generate various scores. You can customize the scorecard data displayed in the console.
entry.title: Feature: Quality AI introduces multiple scorecards

entry.content: Quality AI offers the agent engagement platform where contact center personnel can visualize agent performance data, including an AI-generated summary. The agent engagement platform also identifies areas where an agent excels and needs help compared to their peers.
entry.title: Feature: Agent Engagement Platform

entry.content: Qualilty AI offers agent assessments based on individual conversations. Human evaluators can also add notes to these assessments with feedback for the agent.
entry.summary: Agent assessments can now include notes and feedback from human evaluators, offering more detailed insights into individual conversations.
entry.title: Feature: New feedback feature for agent assessments

entry.content: Quality AI offers sampling rules that filter conversations to reduce the workload for human evaluators, saving contact centers time and money.
entry.summary: Quality AI provides sampling rules to filter conversations, which helps reduce the workload for human evaluators and saves money for contact centers.
entry.title: Feature: New sampling rules for Quality AI

entry.content: Add your own custom tags in Quality AI. In addition to the default Business, Compliance and Customer tags, you can apply custom tags to any question in any scorecard.
entry.summary: You can now add custom tags in Quality AI. In addition to the default tags, you can apply custom tags to any question in any scorecard.
entry.title: Changed: Custom tags in Quality AI

entry.content:
Conversational Insights offers a devkit to help developers and maintainers perform a wide range of actions, including the following:

  • Import one or more conversations with metadata.
  • Transcribe mono audio files.
  • Create recognizers with STT V2.
  • Transform transcript data formats from Genesys Cloud or AWS.
  • Change Conversational Insights global settings.
entry.summary: Conversational Insights now provides a developer kit to help with importing conversations, transcribing audio, creating recognizers, transforming data, and managing settings.
entry.title: Feature: New Developer Kit for Conversational Insights

entry.content: Conversational Insights offers sentiment analysis in GA. Sentiment analysis determines the mood within a conversation and assigns a score: positive, neutral, or negative.
entry.summary: The new update allows you to see the sentiment of your customer conversations in Google Analytics. This feature can help you understand customer satisfaction by analyzing the mood of your conversations and assigning a score of positive, neutral, or negative.
entry.title: Feature: Sentiment Analysis Now Available in Google Analytics

entry.content: Conversational Insights offers a merged analysis, which displays the previous results of each analysis type alongside your most recent analysis result. Merged analysis eliminates the need to run every analysis multiple times.
entry.summary: This feature provides a merged analysis, displaying previous and current analysis results together. This eliminates the need to run analyses multiple times.
entry.title: Feature: Merged Analysis for Conversational Insights
